report.title: Rode the Blazing Heat
report.author: al quimica
report.bodytext: Quickly chewed up 2 peppers (Serranos). /n /n Sweated like mad, and had tingling all over my skin. Once the pain peaked, the coasting began, with a sense of increased focus and slight euphoria. Definitely something there, and it feels great on a really hot day when sweat just douses me.
